org.resthub.common.service

Class CrudServiceImpl<T,ID extends Serializable,R extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<T,ID>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.common.service.CrudServiceImpl<T,ID,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Your resource class to manage, usually an entity class
    ID - Resource id type, usually Long or String
    R - The repository class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrudService<T,ID>

    @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public class CrudServiceImpl<T,ID extends Serializable,R extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<T,ID>>
extends Object
implements CrudService<T,ID>
    CRUD service that uses a PagingAndSortingRepository Spring Data repository implementation You should extend it and inject your Repository bean by overriding setRepository(org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository)
